docs.text: the question isn't why has grease been reissued .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the answer to that one is easy : to celebrate the movie's 20th anniversary and to make more bucks for paramount's coffers because john travolta is once again a hot commodity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: no , the question that ought to be asked is : should grease be reissued ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the answer is not an easy one .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: grease is a fun movie , an entertaining fantasy of the '50s , embodying all the cliches of that era .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the music is lively and the dance numbers , choreographed by patricia birch , are energetic and high-spirited .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: travolta was at his pinnacle as a sexual icon , cool , but non-threatening .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but grease didn't break any new cinematic ground .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it was not a milestone in movie history such as citizen kane or easy rider .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what grease is - or has become - is the highest-grossing musical in film history .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ok , let's not be a spoilsport .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: grease is a fun and entertaining movie , even though it stretches credulity to see such performers as travolta , olivia newton-john , taxi's jeff conaway and the multi-talented stockard channing try to act like high schoolers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's nostalgic to recall how good a dancer travolta was , and it's sad to think of what could have been had not a few missteps sidetracked his career .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he could have become a musical comedy star in the tradition of gene kelly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cinematically , the musical comedy has basically gone the way of the dinosaur .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: between grease and 1996's evita . , you can probably count the number of movie musicals on one hand .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: two reasons have contributed to the demise of the genre : the first is that movie audiences have become more sophisticated , no , make that cynical and jaded .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: today , if a character began to dance and sing with no orchestra in sight , he or she would probably be hooted off the screen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: today's audiences lack the innocence , that belief in movie magic that is required for a musical to succeed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: secondly , a lack of talent .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: performers with the charisma , the style , the larger-than-life panache of fred astaire , gene kelly , ginger rogers and judy garland are gone .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: most singers and dancers remain on the stage , and those who do succeed in movies usually wind up in serious dramatic parts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a good example is gregory hines , one of the greatest dancers in the world .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he danced a bit in the cotton club , tap and white nights , but those were essentially dramatic vehicles .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so , perhaps the reissue of grease can serve a purpose .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: if audiences show enough interest , meaning if the re-release earns the studio enough revenue , it may spark a revival in movie musicals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: perhaps not original musicals such as singin' in the rain , an american in paris or seven brides for seven brothers , but for broadway properties that have been in the planning stages for film adaptations for several years .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: at one time or another , according to the industry rumor mill , hollywood has been set to create an animated version of andrew lloyd webber's cats , a filming of the popular phantom of the opera as well as les miserables and chicago , the latter reportedly to star madonna .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: so , let this grease be the forerunner of an armada of movie musicals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: let grease be the word that sparks this revival .
docs.label: positive
